newsitem.title: INDIA: India RBI raises 5.35 bln rupees at repos auction.
newsitem.headline: India RBI raises 5.35 bln rupees at repos auction.

text.p: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) said it set a cut-off interest rate of 5.25 percent at a repo auction held on Monday.
RBI said it accepted bids for 5.35 billion rupees at Monday's auction.
The RBI said it received 16 bids for 6.20 billion rupees, of which it accepted 12 bids for 5.35 billion rupees.
